summary: I am an experienced business analyst with expertise in development, verification and validation of dashboards. I have 12 years’ experience in international high-tech environment. With my good listening skills and analytical competence, I translate organizational needs into business solutions. I am results driven and quality minded and help the organization to improve their way of working. I have a LEAN certification (Philips) and excellent communication skills in English, Russian and Dutch.

profile_positions.description:
Support to Q&R, R&D, Customer Servicess and other departments for needs in the area of expertise. Smooth cooperation and interaction with partners E2E such as business users, (senior) management, process owners, BPO, BPE, SME across entities in Philips: 
Review input & reporting needs defined in UserRequirementSpec, user stories                                   
Data verification, data interpretation, review of inputs and specs with stakeholders
Data engineering including process understanding, knowledge of application design
Standard reporting, including maintenance of specifications, Code Of Practice
Process ownership for deliverables assigned, responsible for Tool Validation and Code Of Practice and run Daily Management timely

List of projects and activities:
Creation of DFMEA for new service performance reporting:
Responsibilities: leading DFMA activities, interviewing users, developers and other stakeholders to collect information on possible and known risks and creation of the document.
Outcome: successful DFMEA sessions performed, high quality document provided for the project.

SME role in Installed Base improvement program: 
Responsibilities: creation of work instructions, process mapping, identifying issues and gaps.
Outcome: two CAPAs started to focus on critical improvements.

Assignment at Enterprise Information Management: 
Responsibilities: creation of user and technical requirements for new KPIs.

IB registration improvement project to resolve remote connectivity issues:
Responsibilities: project management, planning, communication with stakeholders, analysis of the data, working out of improvements and actions, coordination of execution.
Outcome: improvements implemented, remote connectivity solved for the scope of the project

Project within IGT-S Operations: 
Responsibilities: creation of QlikView reporting prototype including user requirements collection, elimination, and documentation.
Outcome: working prototype introduced to the users.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Manager, Business Analyst, IGT CS IB sustainment

profile_positions.description:
SME Post Market Surveillance reporting, KPIs, providing training, product owner.
Improvement and extension of QlikView dashboard: 
Responsibilities: risk assessments, planning capacity for improvements, managing IT dependencies, assessment validation activities.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst, IGT Systems Q&R Post Market Surveillance

profile_positions.description:
Project management, reporting, KPIs, providing trainings, dashboards creation and validation & verification (incl URS, VTS, VTR, US, UTS, UTR)

List of projects and activities:
Project Creation of SQL & power BI solution for improvement of Installed Base: Responsibilities: planning role, collecting requirements, technical specifications, support development, testing.

Assignment IGT-S FieldServiceOrder creation of unit affected list:
Responsibilities: requirements collection, data analysis, data collection, data manipulation and consolidation.
Outcome: unit affected list for several projects prepared with higher accuracy. 

Project CS & R&D for creation of new process and reporting:
Responsibilities: project management role, planning, user and technical requirements collection and creation, unit test and validation specifications creation and unit test and validation reports creation, coordination and verification of execution, training on the tool.
Outcome: Fully working and validated QlikView dashboard and the process introduced as regulatory required.

Continues improvement project in way of working (LEAN certification assignment)
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst, Customer Services IGT Systems

profile_positions.description:
Rporting, KPIs, data analysis, advice on opportunities for improvement.

List of projects and activities:
Project for SW Validation: 
Responsibilities: planning role, assessment and analysis, validation documentation.

Installed base improvement project: 
Responsibilities: coordinate creation of user requirements, collecting and formalizing requirements, creating planning, performing analysis and assessments of the data, communication of results.

Creation and introduction of new regulatory required report (Excel) for IGT-S Complaint Handling Unit:
Responsibilities: collecting user requirements, creation, introducing verification and review process, training.
Outcome: report introduced and provided regularly as required by regulatory authorities.

Creation of Hazard trending tool (Excel) for IGT-S Complaint Handling Unit:
Responsibilities: collecting user requirements, analysis of data, creation of tool.
Outcome: Tool introduced which improved compliance of Complaint Handling Unit

Different analysis of KPIs, improvements of KPI measurements, root cause analysis, creation of reports, working together with IT partners on including new measurements in current solutions.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst, Customer Services / Complaint Handling Unit  iXR

profile_positions.description:
Developing SAS programs for many different clinical studies (Phase I through IV) based on SAP/protocols in various therapeutic areas.
Creating SAPs. Medical reports contribution (Phase I, IV). Additional activities include: XML mapping, validation of tables and listings of clinical research data, validation of SAS programs.
profile_positions.title: Biometrician

profile_positions.description: Coaching rhythmic gymnastics groups of children 6-16 years old (twice a week 2h). Children were participating in different competitions in the Netherlands and Europe. Refereeing various competitions in the Netherlands (including Dutch championship).
profile_positions.title: Rhythmic Gymnastic coach

profile_positions.description: Conducting experiments, analyzing experimental data, presenting and reporting results.
profile_positions.title: Junior researcher
